text: @SpeakerPelosi According to Steve Brannon on Newsmax, the Trump Admin has known about  the  coronavirus crisis in China for weeks and has been working beyond the scene (in secrecy) for a plan for the US. I smell politics and Russia all over this. Sorry it cost a life and perhaps more to come.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
